publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4699 Christine Grahame: Scottish Seabird Centre, North Berwick—That the Parliament recognises the success of the Scottish Seabird Centre, an independent charity whose purpose is to increase awareness, appreciation and care of Scotland’s rich natural heritage and that it is a world leader in wildlife viewing, with over 200,000 visitors every year supported by over 50 active volunteers; further recognises that, being located at the centre of North Berwick, it has revitalised the community and, in particular, the historic harbour, contributing some £1.5 million per annum to the local economy, and congratulates it on being shortlisted in the Scottish finals of the National Lottery Awards 2006.
S2M-4699 Scottish Seabird Centre, North Berwick (lodged on 9 August 2006) Donald Gorrie*
